statements: SELECT * FROM crops ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT crop_name, yield FROM crops WHERE yield > 100;
SELECT id, crop_name, harvest_date FROM crops WHERE harvest_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE crop_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT crop_name, yield FROM crops WHERE yield < 50 ORDER BY yield DESC;
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE yield > 100 ORDER BY harvest_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT crop_name, yield FROM crops WHERE harvest_date > '2022-01-01' AND yield BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY yield ASC
SELECT id, crop_name FROM crops WHERE yield < 50 OR harvest_date < '2022-05-01' ORDER BY crop_name ASC
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE crop_name LIKE 'Maize%' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT crop_name, harvest_date FROM crops WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5, 7, 9) ORDER BY harvest_date ASC
SELECT farmer_name, total_acres FROM farmers ORDER BY total_acres DESC
SELECT * FROM crop_yields WHERE yield_amount > 100 ORDER BY yield_date ASC
SELECT farmer_name, total_acres FROM farmers WHERE location = 'California'
SELECT crop_type, SUM(yield_amount) as total_yield FROM crop_yields GROUP BY crop_type ORDER BY total_yield DESC
SELECT farmer_name, total_acres FROM farmers JOIN crop_yields ON farmers.farmer_id = crop_yields.farmer_id WHERE crop_type = 'Corn'
SELECT farmer_name, total_acres FROM farmers WHERE total_acres > 100 ORDER BY total_acres DESC;
SELECT farmer_name, location FROM farmers WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT farmer_name, crop_type, yield_amount FROM farmers JOIN crop_yields ON farmers.farmer_id = crop_yields.farmer_id WHERE crop_type = 'Corn' AND yield_amount > 500 ORDER BY yield_amount DESC;

SELECT farmer_name, location, crop_type, yield_amount, yield_date FROM farmers JOIN crop_yields ON farmers.farmer_id = crop_yields.farmer_id WHERE yield_date > '2022-01-01' AND yield_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM farmers;
SELECT * FROM Farmers;
SELECT farmer_name, location FROM Farmers WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT crop_name, yield_per_acre FROM Crops ORDER BY yield_per_acre DESC;
SELECT c.crop_name, h.quantity_harvested, h.harvest_date FROM Crops c INNER JOIN CropHarvests h ON c.crop_id = h.crop_id;
SELECT f.farmer_name, c.crop_name, ch.harvest_date FROM (Farmers f INNER JOIN Crops c ON f.farmer_id = c.farmer_id) INNER JOIN CropHarvests ch ON c.crop_id = ch.crop_id ORDER BY ch.harvest_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Farmers;
SELECT farmer_name, location FROM Farmers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT crop_name, yield_per_acre FROM Crops WHERE yield_per_acre > 500;
SELECT harvest_date, quantity_harvested FROM CropHarvests WHERE quantity_harvested BETWEEN 100 AND 500;

SELECT farmer_id, crop_name, harvest_date FROM Farmers JOIN Crops ON Farmers.farmer_id = Crops.farmer_id JOIN CropHarvests ON Crops.crop_id = CropHarvests.crop_id ORDER BY farmer_id ASC, harvest_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Farmers;
SELECT farmer_name, farmer_location FROM Farmers ORDER BY farmer_id DESC;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM Crops WHERE crop_location='Field';
SELECT yield_amount, yield_date FROM Yields WHERE crop_id=1 ORDER BY yield_date ASC;
SELECT crop_name, predicted_yield FROM Crops JOIN HarvestPredictions ON Crops.crop_id = HarvestPredictions.crop_id WHERE prediction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Farmers WHERE farmer_location='California';
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM Crops ORDER BY crop_type DESC;
SELECT farmer_name, farmer_location FROM Farmers WHERE farmer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT crop_name, SUM(yield_amount) AS total_yield FROM Crops INNER JOIN Yields ON Crops.crop_id = Yields.crop_id GROUP BY crop_name;
SELECT prediction_date, crop_name, predicted_yield FROM HarvestPredictions JOIN Crops ON HarvestPredictions.crop_id = Crops.crop_id WHERE predicted_yield > 1000 ORDER BY prediction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM farmers;
SELECT name, location FROM farmers WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(yield_amount) AS max_yield FROM yields;
SELECT crops.name, yields.yield_date, yields.yield_amount FROM crops INNER JOIN yields ON crops.id = yields.crop_id;
SELECT farmer_id, SUM(harvested_amount) AS total_harvested FROM harvests GROUP BY farmer_id;
SELECT * FROM farmers ORDER BY name DESC, start_date ASC
SELECT name, location, start_date FROM farmers WHERE location = 'California' AND start_date >= '2022-01-01'

SELECT crops.name, yields.yield_amount, harvests.harvested_amount FROM crops JOIN yields ON crops.id = yields.crop_id JOIN harvests ON crops.id = harvests.crop_id WHERE yields.yield_amount > 1000 AND harvests.harvested_amount > 800
SELECT * FROM predictions WHERE prediction_date BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-08-31' ORDER BY predicted_yield DESC

SELECT farmers.name AS farmer_name, crops.name AS crop_name, yields.yield_amount AS actual_yield, predictions.predicted_yield AS predicted_yield FROM farmers JOIN yields ON farmers.id = yields.farmer_id JOIN crops ON yields.crop_id = crops.id JOIN predictions ON crops.id = predictions.crop_id ORDER BY farmer_name ASC, crop_name ASC
